attributes.name: Group
attributes.description: A group of people that meet together regularly.

attributes.name: archived_at
attributes.description: The date and time the group was archived.

attributes.name: can_create_conversation
attributes.description:
A boolean representing the current user's authorization to start a new conversation in the group.


Only available when requested with the `?fields` param

attributes.name: chat_enabled
attributes.description: A boolean representing whether or not the group has Chat enabled.

attributes.name: contact_email
attributes.description:
If a contact_email is provided, we will display a contact button on the public page
where potential members can ask questions before joining the group.

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: The date and time the group was created.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A longform description of the group. Can contain HTML markup.

attributes.name: events_visibility
attributes.description:
The visibility of events for the group.


Possible values: `public` or `members`

attributes.name: header_image
attributes.description:
A hash of header image URLs. The keys are `thumbnail`, `medium`, and `original`.

```json
{
  "thumbnail": "https://groups-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/group/header_image/1986065/thumbnail_image-1676676396838.jpg",
  "medium": "https://groups-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/group/header_image/1986065/medium_image-1676676396838.jpg",
  "original": "https://groups-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/group/header_image/1986065/image-1676676396838.jpg"
}
```

attributes.name: leaders_can_search_people_database
attributes.description:
Whether or not group leaders have access to the entire
church database on the admin side of Groups. (Not recommended)

attributes.name: location_type_preference
attributes.description:
The location type preference for the group.


Possible values: `physical` or `virtual`

attributes.name: members_are_confidential
attributes.description: Whether or not group members can see other members' info

attributes.name: memberships_count
attributes.description:
The number of members in the group, includes leaders.
Does not include membership requests.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name/title of the group.

attributes.name: public_church_center_web_url
attributes.description: The public URL for the group on Church Center.

attributes.name: schedule
attributes.description:
A text summary of the group's typical meeting schedule.
Can be a string like "Sundays at 9:30am" or "Every other Tuesday at 7pm".

attributes.name: tag_ids
attributes.description:
The IDs of the tags associated with the group.


Only available when requested with the `?fields` param

attributes.name: virtual_location_url
attributes.description:
The URL for the group's virtual location. A zoom link, for example.
This could be set even if `location_type_preference` is `physical`.
This is useful if you want to display a zoom link even if the group is meeting in person.

attributes.name: widget_status
attributes.description:
DEPRECATED: This is a private attribute used by Home widgets that we plan to remove soon.


Only available when requested with the `?fields` param

attributes.name: group_type
attributes.note:
The group type that this group belongs to.
Unique groups do not belong to a group type
and will return a `null` data set for the relationship.

attributes.name: location
attributes.note:
The group's default location is where the group normally meets.
But remember, each group event can have its own location if needed.

attributes.name: assign_campuses
attributes.can_run: Must be an administrator, group type manager, or leader.
attributes.details:
This action can be used to assign campuses to a group.
All campuses will be replaced so the full data set must be sent.

attributes.name: Group
attributes.description: A group of people that meet together regularly.

attributes.name: disable_chat
attributes.can_run:
Can be run by administrators or group type managers,
as well as leaders if allowed by the group type's settings.
attributes.details:
Disables chat for the given group. This will hide chat from the group.
You must confirm your intention with a `confirm` attribute to allow this action to succeed.

attributes.name: Group
attributes.description: A group of people that meet together regularly.

attributes.name: enable_chat
attributes.can_run:
Can be run by administrators or group type managers,
as well as leaders if allowed by the group type's settings.
attributes.details:
Enables chat for the given group. Enabling chat will make the names of each member visible to
other group members. Chat cannot be enabled for a group if the member list is confidential.
You must confirm your intention with a `confirm` attribute to allow this action to succeed.

attributes.name: Group
attributes.description: A group of people that meet together regularly.

attributes.name: applications
attributes.details: requests to join this group

attributes.name: campuses
attributes.details: campuses assigned this group

attributes.name: enrollment
attributes.details: enrollment details for this group

attributes.name: events
attributes.details: events for this group

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: do not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: group_type
attributes.details: group type of this group

attributes.name: location
attributes.details: default physical location for this group's events

attributes.name: memberships
attributes.details: memberships belonging to this group

attributes.name: people
attributes.details: people who have memberships for this group

attributes.name: resources
attributes.details: file and link resources shared with this group

attributes.name: tags
attributes.details: tags assigned to this group

attributes.name: groups
attributes.details: groups which have applied this campus

attributes.name: group
attributes.details: group which the event belongs to

attributes.name: group
attributes.details: group being applied to

attributes.name: groups
attributes.details: groups belonging to this group type

attributes.name: group
attributes.details: group that manages this location

attributes.name: group
attributes.details: group for this membership

attributes.name: groups
attributes.details: groups for this organization

scopes.name: campus
scopes.scope_help:
from specific campuses; provide an additional `campus_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=campus&campus_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group
scopes.scope_help:
from specific groups; provide an additional `group_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group&group_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group_type
scopes.scope_help:
from specific group types; provide an additional `group_type_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group_type&group_type_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: my_groups
scopes.scope_help: only groups of which you are a member

scopes.name: people_database_searchable
scopes.scope_help:
based on their setting of allowing leaders to search the entire
church database in Groups; provide an additional
`people_database_searchable` param with `only` or `none`,
ex: `?filter=people_database_searchable&people_database_searchable=only`

attributes.name: groups
attributes.details: groups of which this person is a member

attributes.name: groups
attributes.details: groups which have applied this tag

attributes.name: enrollment
attributes.description: include associated enrollment

attributes.name: group_type
attributes.description: include associated group_type

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: include associated location

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-name) to reverse the order

attributes.name: archive_status
attributes.description:
Query on a specific archive_status

Possible values: `not_archived`, `only`, or `include`

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Query on a specific name

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: get results from given offset
